about.title: From Struggle to Success
about.subtitle: The story of transformation, discipline, and never giving up
about.origin: Born in a small Serbian village, I learned early that success requires sacrifice and unwavering determination.
about.philosophyDesc: I believe that consistent effort beats natural talent every time. This philosophy has guided me from a small village in Serbia to becoming an elite fitness coach in Dubai.

milestones.villageDesc: Growing up in a Serbian village, I discovered my passion for fitness and helping others transform their lives.
milestones.universityDesc: Moved to Novi Sad for education, where I began my journey into professional fitness training.
milestones.firstJobDesc: Started at Invictus Training Center, learning the fundamentals of professional coaching.
milestones.growthDesc: Joined Profitnes Gym as head trainer, developing my signature training methodology.
milestones.dubaiDesc: Made the bold move to Dubai, bringing my expertise to an international clientele.
milestones.eliteDesc: Now helping clients worldwide achieve their fitness goals through personalized programs.
